name: Kings Kollege: Nambers (itch)
description:
It's simple to pick-up and learn, but it will give your brain a workout as you advance to the more difficult levels.

Select adjacent cells with the same number and scroll them left and right to change their values. Complete levels by creating the target pattern. Finish in as few moves as possible to get all of the stars. You will find over 50 levels.

No moves limit, no time limit. Play this perfect mobile game and have fun!
